English: Cain: Oh, this sucks. You'd think there'd be more than just one Uzi in a gun store.
Cain: There are ammo boxes on the back shelf. Do they work for this gun?
Cain: Nothing on the shelf besides bullets.
Cain: What's in this drawer?
Cain: ...
Cain: Nothing. I got excited for no reason.
Cain: There wasn't anything in there. No need to check again.
Cain: I'm getting hungry. I always get hungry when I'm on assignment.
Cain: There was a gun here but everything else was taken out. I guess a zombie brought the gun in?
Cain: The clerk wouldn't have put the gun here. Maybe it was another person? Maybe even Cole?
Cain: You'd think there'd be more weapons here. I guess everyone looted it already.
Cain: I don't have a lot of gun experience. I'm not even sure what kind of bullets an Uzi takes.
Cain: I've never shot a revolver before.
Cain: For the time being, it's safer to take it with me.
Cain: I thought this was a thing to put bullets into.
Cain: I wish I'd learned more about guns.
Cain: If I remember movies, I think you hold the grip like this?
Cain: Is this really going to work with these bullets?
Cain: Any bullets in that box?
Cain: ...
Cain: Hmmm... about 20 bullets remain.
Cain: What kind of bullets are these...?
Cain: I mean an Uzi is a pretty common gun, so I'd guess it uses standard bullets?
Cain: Alright, we'll, I'll give it a shot.
Cain: I'm pretty sure the bullets go here...
Cain: ...One... Two... Three!
Cain: This is complicated. I feel like if you loaded the bullets in like this in a battlefield, you'd be killed.
Cain: Okay... 23 bullets in total. I better not put the magazine in backwards or the bullets will go towards me! ...I think that's how it works.
Cain: Speaking of which, there should be a safety on this, right?
Cain: Wait, this is... this lever could be it.
Cain: Well, I think this is all working now. I could try shooting it at the table?
